snippet.title: Rarity (2023) by Matallon - Game play video
snippet.description:
Rarity - full game be found here, this is just the first section: https://matallon.itch.io/rarity 

Explore and re-organise the small landscapes and story so can get back to reality again. 

Short little narrative game about life continuing after COVID, and the weird time skip that occured for many people as their lives drastically changed in time that no longer feels like it really happened. Takes this in combination with the short amount of time spent in University, the feeling of time passing, and time being over before it's begun. 

Dialogue inspired by A Short Hike - I really love how the characters speak in that game and tried to embody it, but reports from my friends testing this game state that playing this is similar to a regular conversation with me. 

Developed using Yarn Spinner within the Unity game engine.  I'm still fairly new to unity so hence why this game is quite basic, and a lot of development time was spent working out how to do certain things, and meant I wasn't able to implement everything I wanted! 

I'd love to hear any feedback or comment you may have on the game!
